justifications: Brexit embodies the very principles and ideals the American people hold dear to their hearts: self-determination, limited government, democratic accountability, and economic liberty.

The United States should seize upon Brexit as a tremendous opportunity to sign an historic free trade agreement with the United Kingdom-a deal that would advance prosperity on both sides of the Atlantic.
Brexit will also strengthen the Anglo-American special relationship, the most important bilateral partnership in the world.
Britain will be a stronger ally for the United States, from confronting Russian aggression in Eastern Europe.
Britain will be a stronger ally for the United States, from...defeating the Islamist terror threat.
The momentous victory for the Brexit campaign signals a new era of freedom for the British people.
The vote for Brexit (52 percent of Britons cast ballots to leave the EU) is a vote for sovereignty and self-determination.
Brexit will result in a bonfire of red tape, freeing the city of London and enterprises across the nation from European Union diktat.
British businesses will be liberated from mountains of EU regulations, which have undermined economic liberty.
British judges will no longer be overruled by the European Court of Justice.
Britain will no longer be subject to European legislation.

references: being shackled to the European Union

justifications: After more than four decades of being shackled to the European Union... Great Britain has declared its independence.
The Iron Lady believed firmly that Britain would be better off outside the European Union.
The Iron Lady believed firmly that Britain would be better off outside the European Union.
Brexit will also strengthen the Anglo-American special relationship, the most important bilateral partnership in the world.
Britain will no longer be subject to European legislation.
British judges will no longer be overruled by the European Court of Justice.
